clusters.title: Commerce Impact
clusters.description: TikTok has become a major platform for viral content and significant sales. Posts tagged with #FYP have reached an astounding 35 trillion views, highlighting the platform's vast reach. In the realm of commerce, Stormi Steele set a record by surpassing $2 million in TikTok Shop sales during a single livestream. Additionally, the 2024 Paris Olympics generated significant engagement, with Olympics-related hashtags garnering nearly 50 billion views.
